name: CoopHead
description:
Speedrun in coop this die and retry 2D platformer with a friend.

This game has been designed to be played with two players: the first one using the keyboard and second one the mouse. (they will have to switch their roles during the gameplay)

CONTROLS

Keyboard: A-D (or Q-D) to move horizontally the player. Space to jump
Mouse: Left click to place a simple booster. Right click to place/use a big booster

HOW TO PLAY

Reach the end of the level by the quickest time possible.
When the player is near to a simple booster (left click to place), he can jumps another time (even when in the air).
When the player is near a big booster (right click to place), the player is getting stucked in the air and then thrown out when right click is released

TEAM:

Game Programmer: Outfoxeed

Level Designer: RodeSeze
